Maika and I finished cleaning and went to the\nkitchen together.%K%P
'This is hard.'%K%P
'You can be surprisingly clumsy sometimes.'%K%P
'Don't worry, I'll get the hang of it soon enough.'%K%P
'Good, I'm expecting great things from you.'%K%P
In the midst of our back and forth, I snuck\na glance at Maika.%K%P
We were still both avoiding the subject of whatever\nit was she was worried about.%K%P
Somehow I couldn't just let it go.%K%P
Come to think of it, why was I so desperate to listen\nto Maika's problems anyway?%K%P
My attention had started to wander, and the kitchen\nknife I was holding slipped and cut my finger.%K%P
'Sho! Are you okay?!'%K%P
'Yowch... Yeah, I'm fine.'%K%P
'Y-You're bleeding...\nWe've got to do something!\nUh, let's see...uh...'%K%P
'Urgh, there's so much blood!\nWhat do I do?!'%K%P
'Maybe a band-aid?\nWill that do any good?'%K%P
Seeing Maika in such a panic actually helped\nme to stay calm.%K%P
It almost felt like all this was happening\nto someone else.%K%P
'Okay, okay...\nFirst we've got to clean the wound!'%K%P
'Huh?'%K%P
A wet warmth suddenly engulfed my finger.%K%P
'Mn... *Slurp*...*Lick*'%K%P
Maika was licking the wound clean.\nIt didn't hurt. In fact, this sensation\nwas something else entirely.%K%P
In a weird way, it felt kinda good...%K%P
'M-Maika?'%K%P
'Mmm... Ah, sorry. Does it hurt?'%K%P
'No, it's great--\nNo, wait! I mean,\nwhat are you doing?!'%K%P
'What do you mean?'%K%P
'I mean, why are you licking my finger?'%K%P
'Ah!'%K%P
As she finally realized what she was doing,\nMaika's face went bright red.%K%P
'I-I-It's not... I mean, this is... Sorry, you must\nthink I'm a total weirdo.'%K%P
'No, not at all!\nYou can lick it some more\nif you want!'%K%P
Wait, what the heck did I just say?!%K%P
'Oh, so you want more?'%K%P
'Th-That's not really what I meant,\nI just kinda got caught up\nin the moment...'%K%P
'So then, you don't want me to?'%K%P
Why did she look so disappointed?%K%P
'Well, I didn't say that...'%K%P
'Really?'%K%P
'Yeah.'%K%P
This time it was my turn to blush.%K%P
How did we even get into this situation?%K%P
'Heehee... Let's get back to it.'%K%P
Maika looked up into my face.%K%P
When our eyes met, my heart started to pound.%K%P
'B-Back to what?'%K%P
'Cleaning the wound, of course...'%K%P
'Don't get the wrong idea! I just don't want it\nto get infected, and there's no point in\nstopping halfway...right?'%K%P
She was trembling slightly, as if she was\nafraid I'd say no.%K%P
For a moment I stopped thinking of her as my\nchildhood friend, and just saw her as a\nvery attractive young woman.%K%P
'R-Right... Go ahead.'%K%P
'Okay...'%K%P
'*Lick* Mmm... Mm...'%K%P
Was this scenario always so sensual?%K%P
There was silence, apart from the echo\nof the ticking clock and the sound of Maika's\ntongue running over my finger.%K%P
'*Slurp* Ahh... Sho...?'%K%P
'Ngh...'%K%P
Maika looked up at me again, still blushing deeply.%K%P
Her eyes were beginning to tear up, perhaps\nbecause of the unbearable tension in the room.%K%P
I knew Maika was pretty, but being with her in\nthis steamy situation seemed to make\nher beauty even more intense.%K%P
'M-Maika.'%K%P
Was she always this cute?%K%P
I'd never really thought about it before.%K%P
We'd been friends for so many years, why was I only\nbecoming aware of it now?%K%P
Or maybe I'd subconsciously been trying not to\nthink about it?%K%P
Just as things were starting to feel awkward...%K%P
'Sho, Maika, what 'til you hear this!\nThat stupid boss of ours--'%K%P
'Wha?!'%K%P
The door swung open and Akane came charging in.%K%P
Surprised and completely off-guard, Maika and I\nsprang away from each other.%K%P
'Huh? What's up with you two?'%K%P
'N-Nothing! Everything's totally normal\naround here. Right, Maika?'%K%P
'Yeah! Of course! We weren't doing anything weird!'%K%P
'Uh, okay, sure.\nWhy are you acting like you've got\nsomething to hide, then?'%K%P
'Never mind about that!\nDidn't you have some news for us?\nYou sounded pretty mad.'%K%P
'Oh yeah. So, get this, our dumb boss says\nshe won't recognize all the work\nI've been doing!'%K%P
'Huh? What happened?'%K%P
'Haaah...ahhh... Akane, you run too fast...'%K%P
Before we could get any details, Inori arrived,\npanting and out of breath.%K%P
'Welcome back, Inori.'%K%P
'Yeah, welcome back.'%K%P
'Ahhh... *Gasp* Th-Thank you...'%K%P
'Why don't you sit down?\nI'll get us all some tea.'%K%P
I glanced at Maika.%K%P
The seductive atmosphere that surrounded\nher before was gone now.%K%P
'Aaah, I feel so much better now.'%K%P
After Inori had a chance to catch her breath and\ndrink some tea, we got back to the matter at\nhand.%K%P
'So, what happened between you and your boss?'%K%P
'Urgh, I don't know where to start!\nShe said what I'm doing right now\ndoesn't count as real rehab!'%K%P
'She got mad at you, then?'%K%P
Akane didn't reply, she just turned away\nwith a sulky look on her face.%K%P
'The problem may be a little more serious\nthan you realize...'%K%P
Inori proceeded to fill us in on the details\nof the meeting.%K%P
'So, the goddess in charge of you thinks Akane's\njust playing around?'%K%P
'That's right. She said we ought to take this more\nseriously, and...well...'%K%P
'More bad news?'%K%P
Inori shifted uncomfortably before answering.%K%P
'Our boss said we should start finding you\nnew accommodation.'%K%P
'Does that mean what I think it means?'%K%P
Judging by this report, Inori's boss wasn't\nexpecting Akane's rehabilitation to be a success.%K%P
The demolition of Tsubaki Apartments was\nalready a given in her eyes.%K%P
'I-I contested the decision, of course!\nWe should still continue trying.'%K%P
For now, huh?%K%P
However long that was, it didn't feel like we\nhad a lot of time left.%K%P
We'd needed to think up some new plan.%K%P
No ideas occurred to any of us right then, though.%K%P
Sitting beside me, Maika was lost in thought,\nher expression unreadable.%K%P
We talked for a little longer, eventually deciding\nto carry on as we had been doing for now.%K%P
I went back to my room and lay down, thinking over\nall the things we discussed.%K%P
'Tsubaki Apartments...'%K%P
I'd lived here for so long.%K%P
Naturally, it was a place I felt attached to,\nthat I wanted to protect.%K%P
But it was the memories of the times I'd\nshared here with Maika that really felt important.%K%P
'Maika...'%K%P
I mumbled her name and looked at the cut\non my finger.%K%P
I recalled the way it had felt when Maika licked it,\nand felt my face going red.%K%P
Maika was all I could think about.%K%P
'What is wrong with me?'%K%P
I really should've been thinking about how to save\nTsubaki, but I'd just been\nthinking about Maika instead.%K%P
'Stop being weird.'%K%P
'Huh? Stop doing what now?'%K%P
A few days had passed. I was still thinking about\nMaika when Akane confronted me.%K%P
'You and Maika. The last few days you haven't\nbeen yourselves.'%K%P
'Why don't you two talk anymore?'%K%P
'Oh, I noticed that, too.\nYou always look away\nwhen you make eye contact.'%K%P
'Did you get into a fight with Maika?'%K%P
'A fight? Not exactly...'%K%P
'What, then?'%K%P
'Well...'%K%P
I didn't really know how to answer.%K%P
'Now that I think about it... The two of you started\nacting strangely after we got back from the meeting\nwith our boss.'%K%P
'Did something happen while we were away?'%K%P
Their eyes bore into me.%K%P
'If you've got a problem, you can always tell us.'%K%P
'You helped me out before, remember?\nLet me return the favor.'%K%P
'I might not be able to do much,\nbut we've got Inori here for\nany serious stuff.'%K%P
'That's right, Sho. I'd be glad to help out if you\nneed someone to talk to.'%K%P
'Akane... Inori...'%K%P
They had a point. If I kept this to myself\nI'd just keep running around in circles\nand be no good to anyone.%K%P
Maybe it would be better to talk about it.\nIt seemed like I could at least expect some\nsympathy from the two goddesses.%K%P
'Okay, it's like this...'%K%P
I told them everything that had happened,\nnot holding back any details.%K%P
'Ah, I see.'%K%P
'Yeah... Ever since then,\nwhenever I see Maika I\ncan't help but stare.'%K%P
Not only that, but I felt too nervous to talk to her\nlike I usually would.%K%P
It was like I'd completely forgotten how to act\nnormal in her presence.%K%P
'I wish I could relax around her, but...'%K%P
'Hmm... About that.'%K%P
Akane looked to Inori for approval.\nInori nodded.%K%P
Did they have an idea already?%K%P
'It sounds like love.'%K%P
'L-Love?'%K%P
'We both think so. You like Maika, don't you?'%K%P
I...like...Maika?%K%P
'We're just childhood frie--'%K%P
'Sho.'%K%P
'I understand your not wanting to jeopardize a\nfriendship you've had for so long.'%K%P
'But if you don't step outside that comfort zone,\nyou may lose your chance at something even better.'%K%P
'Yeah, if you like her, you like her.\nI think you two'd make a great couple.'%K%P
'Think about it this way - if this place did get\nclosed down, you wouldn't want to get\nseparated from Maika, would you?'%K%P
It didn't take long for me to come up with an answer.%K%P
'No. No, I wouldn't.'%K%P
Maika and I had been together for so long.%K%P
I didn't know what I'd do if she suddenly wasn't\nthere by my side.%K%P
Was that just because I'd grown up with her?%K%P
'That's not it...'%K%P
I wanted to be the one to make Maika smile,\nto make her happy, to be by her side.%K%P
'I get it now...'%K%P
It was just like Akane and Inori said.%K%P
'I like Maika's smile, I like watching her working\nhard, I like the way she tries to hide her true\nfeelings... I like everything about her.'%K%P
Just thinking about her made my heart swell up like\nit might burst.%K%P
My happiest memories were of times I'd spent\ntogether with Maika.%K%P
I was finally starting to realize just how much she\nmeant to me.%K%P
'You're looking a lot happier all of a sudden.'%K%P
'Am I? It's thanks to you two if I am.'%K%P
'We were right, right? You do like Maika?'%K%P
'Yeah... You were right.'%K%P
'What will you do now?'%K%P
'Isn't it obvious?'%K%P
Now that I knew how I felt, there was no\nturning back.%K%P
Even if she turned me down, even if this ruined our\nfriendship, I just couldn't keep these feelings\nto myself anymore.%K%P
'I'm going to tell her.'%K%P
'Yeah! Go for it!'%K%P
'I'm sure you'll be fine.\nWe'll both be cheering for you.'%K%P
'Thanks. Do you think I could ask you for\nsome more advice?'%K%P
'Huh?'%K%P
'What kind of advice?'%K%P
'I'm going to ask Maika out, but...maybe you could\ntell me a little about what girls like in a guy?'%K%P
'Of course! I think we can handle that much.'%K%P
'We'll do anything to help out!'%K%P
I was so truly glad to have friends I could\ncount on.%K%P
I took a long, deep breath and knocked on\nMaika's door.%K%P
'Who is it?'%K%P
'It's me.'%K%P
'Sh-Sho? What do you want?'%K%P
'I want to ask you something. Can I come in?'%K%P
'Do you have to?'%K%P
'Yeah, it's kinda private.'%K%P
'P-Private?!'%K%P
Did I go too far?%K%P
'Sorry, that was inconsiderate of me.'%K%P
'I don't mind.'%K%P
'Really?'%K%P
'Yeah... Just wait a minute.'%K%P
'Okay, come in.'%K%P
I stepped into Maika's room.%K%P
I knew I was the one who'd asked to come in, but\nbeing alone with Maika still made me nervous.%K%P
This was no time to clam up!%K%P
'Maika.'%K%P
'Y-Yes?'%K%P
I might have got awkward and looked away before,\nbut now things were different.%K%P
Running from my feelings was no longer an option.%K%P
'Are you free tomorrow?'%K%P
'Huh? Tomorrow? Uh, I need to do some housework\nin the morning, but otherwise...'%K%P
'Cool. Do you want to go on a date with me, then?'%K%P
'Oh, okay. Sure.'%K%P
'...Wait a minute.'%K%P
'Did you say 'date'?'%K%P
'Yep. A date.'%K%P
'Whaaat? A d-d-date? Wh-What do you think you're\ndoing, asking me something like that?!'%K%P
'Is that a no?'%K%P
'No! I mean, not 'no', but...I'm just surprised, I\nwasn't expecting this.'%K%P
I couldn't blame her.%K%P
'I know things have been kinda awkward between\nus lately. This is kind of to make up for that, too.'%K%P
'I see... Okay. Let's do it.\nLet's go...on a date.'%K%P
'Great. How about we meet up in Kannagi Park?'%K%P
'Meet up? We live in the same building,\nwhy don't we just start out from here?'%K%P
'No way, meeting up somewhere first is part of the\nfun of a date.'%K%P
'You sound like a starry-eyed young girl.'%K%P
'Yeah, but I agree.\nThat is part of the appeal.'%K%P
'Well, it is gonna be our first date.\nI want to do this right.'%K%P
'Do you have to keep calling it a date?\nAre you doing that on purpose?'%K%P
'Maybe I am, maybe I'm not.'%K%P
Honestly, I wanted to come out and tell her how I\nfelt right then and there.%K%P
But I had to be patient.%K%P
First I needed to dispel the feeling of distance\nthat still existed between us.%K%P
After that, I'd make my move.%K%P
'Is this time okay?'%K%P
'Sure. I should have finished everything I need to\ndo by then.'%K%P
'Great. I'm really looking forward to this.'%K%P
'M-Me too...'%K%P
That way she shifted around all embarrassed\nwas so darn cute!%K%P
'I-Is that all you needed?'%K%P
'Yeah. Sorry for barging in.'%K%P
'It's okay... See you tomorrow.'%K%P
'See you then.'%K%P
I left the room and heaved a sigh of relief.%K%P
'All right, now to draw up a plan of action.\nI've gotta do all I can to make tomorrow a hit!'%K%P
I didn't know how this would change my\nrelationship with Maika.%K%P
But as I walked back to my room, all I felt was\nexcitement in anticipation of our date.%K%P
